Check.Name: UserRightsAssignment/SeNetworkLogonRight
Check.Value: BUILTIN\Administrators,NT AUTHORITY\Authenticated Users,NT AUTHORITY\ENTERPRISE DOMAIN CONTROLLERS

Check.Name: UserRightsAssignment/SeCreateGlobalPrivilege
Check.Value: BUILTIN\Administrators,NT AUTHORITY\LOCAL SERVICE,NT AUTHORITY\NETWORK SERVICE,NT AUTHORITY\SERVICE

Check.Name: TcpipNetbiosOptions
Check.Query: Select * from win32_networkadapterconfiguration where IPEnabled=TRUE and TcpipNetbiosOptions!=2
